step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed into fists and draw your arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Ensure they reach shoulder height as you exhale and relax.
Excellent! Continue to open your fingers and extend arms to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing.
Great job maintaining shoulder height. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement as you open fingers and extend arms.
Good work on the arm extension. Try to keep your wrists straighter during this movement.
Second rep starting well! Remember to close fingers into fists, draw arms in, inhale, and tighten muscles.
Good extension. Ensure your arms reach shoulder height as you exhale and relax your muscles.
Excellent! Keep opening fingers and extending arms to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing.
Great job maintaining shoulder height. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement as you open fingers and extend arms.
Good arm extension. For the next repetition, try to keep your wrists straighter and more aligned with your forearms.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists closed and arms in front when inhaling, then open your fingers and extend arms to shoulder height while exhaling. Focus on keeping your wrists straight for better results.
